feature.label: Feature
feature.description: Xronos: High Level Synthesis of Streaming Applications is a collection of tools under GNU GPL3, Apache 2, and BSD licences created by EPFL, and IETR/INSA (and Xilinx for OpenForge HLS) for the RVC-CAL dataflow programming language.
